content.rendered:
Directed by Flying Lotus. Maggie Levin. Tyler MacIntyre. Johannes Roberts. Joseph Winter. Vanessa Winter

Written by Zoe Cooper. Flying Lotus. Chris Lee Hill. Maggie Levin. Tyler MacIntyre. Johannes Roberts. Joseph Winter. Vanessa Winter

Star Jesse LaTourette(Rachel (segment “Shredding”)). Keanush Tafreshi(Ankur (segment “Shredding”)). Dashiell Derrickson(Chris Carbonara (segment “Shredding”)). Jackson Kelly(Kaleb (segment “Shredding”)). Tybee Diskin(RC (segment “Shredding”)). Verona Blue(Deirdre (segment “Shredding”)). Aminah Nieves(Charissa (segment “Shredding”)). Kelley Missal(Jessie (segment “Shredding”)). Melissa Macedo(Jessie Deux (segment “Shredding”)). Ally Ioannides(Lily (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Isabelle Hahn(Annie (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Breana Raquel(Helen (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Caitlin Serros(Imogene (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Brittany Gandy(Lucy (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Logan Riley(Hannah (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Maurice Webster(Security Guard (segment “Suicide Bid”)). Steven Ogg(Host (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Jerry Boyd(Marcus (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Sonya Eddy(Debra (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Amelia Ann(Donna (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Charles Lott Jr.(Brandon (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Stephanie Ray(Ozzy (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Lauren Powers(Bodybuilder (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Lukas Gilbert(Timmy (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Shae Rodriguez(Stretcher Kid (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Jeff Barnett(Stage Hand 1 (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Khalid Ghajji(Stage Hand 2 (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Zinnett Hendrix(Contestant 1 (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Raquel Cain(Contestant 2 (segment “Ozzy’s Dungeon”)). Emily Sweet(Sandra (segment “The Gawkers”)). Luke Mullen(Dylan (segment “The Gawkers”)). Ethan Pogue(Brady (segment “The Gawkers”)). Cree Kawa(Mark (segment “The Gawkers”)). Tyler Lofton(Kurt (segment “The Gawkers”)). Duncan Anderson(Boner (segment “The Gawkers”)). Denise Dorado(Emma (segment “The Gawkers”)). Janna Bossier(Mom (segment “The Gawkers”)). Hannah Kat Jones(Cassidy (segment “The Gawkers”)). Danny Jolles(Delivery Driver (segment “The Gawkers”)). Archelaus Crisanto(Nate (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Joseph Winter(Troy (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Melanie Stone(Mabel (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Kim Abunuwara(Jane (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Ehab Abunuwara(Husband (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Ryann Abunuwara(Julia / Tortured Screams (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Tori Pence(Kirsten (segment “To Hell And Back”)). James C. Morris(Furcas / Sticky Man / Faceless / Tortured Screams (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Perla Lacayo(Witch Alex (segment “To Hell And Back”) (as Alex Lacayo)). Vickie Hayden(Witch Vickie (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Coe-Jane Weight(Grandma Great (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Ariel Lee(Wormaid (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Dustin Watts(Ukoban (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Calen Chan(Winged Demon 1 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Christian Russell(Winged Demon 2 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Tyler Evans(Giant Devil / Tortured Soul 1 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Miguel Peña(Tortured Soul 2 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Parker Cluff(Tortured Soul 3 / Cave Body (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Sena Warren(Cave Tortured Soul (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Casey Warren(Bloodletter 1 / Voice of Satan (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Alex Hasse(Bloodletter 2 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Beni Alexander(Bloodletter 3 (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Halem Medina(Large Bloodletter / Bloodletter Voice (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Corbett McAllister(Troy’s Stunt Double (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Marc Miller(Bloodletter Voice (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Austin Anderson(Bloodletter Voice (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Jared Cook(Bloodletter Voice (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Vanessa Winter(Voice of Wormaid (segment “To Hell And Back”)). Amanda Seria(Tortured Screams (segment “To Hell And Back”) (as Amanda Cook))

Language English

Producers Matt Bettinelli-Olpin. David Bruckner. Jared Cook. Gabi Cuascut. Paige Dowling. Tyler Gillett. Josh Goldbloom. Brad Miska. John Negropontes. Chad Villella. Andrew Williams. Vanessa Winter

Production Cook Filmworks. Winterspectre Entertainment
